sections.text: FutureBox is an interactive real estate visualization platform with 3D models and cartography. Combines Three.js for rendering GLB building models and Mapbox GL for interactive maps via Threebox plugin.

Platform allows viewing buildings in 3D directly on map, filtering apartments, studying layouts and characteristics. Uses modern component architecture Vue 3 with Composition API and design system in glassmorphism style.

Project developed as part of team of friends and like-minded people. I was responsible for frontend development: 3D model integration, creation of platform for showcasing properties, and connection with executor. Current version was created in one week, project continues to develop.

blocks.text: Classic real estate sites show only photos and descriptions. Project idea — give user ability to explore real estate in three-dimensional space with absolutely free control through interactive dynamic 3D map. Need a platform where you can freely move, rotate, scale, and study objects in 3D directly on map.
Create interactive platform with integration of 3D building models on Mapbox maps, apartment filtering, detailed panels with information, and adaptive interface for all devices.

blocks.subtitle: 3D visualization and cartography
blocks.text: Integrated Three.js for rendering GLB building models and Mapbox GL for interactive maps. Used Threebox plugin for overlaying 3D models on maps — buildings display in 3D directly on map with rotation and scaling capability.

blocks.subtitle: Component architecture
blocks.text: Built modular architecture: base design system components (`components/base/`), composite components for buildings and apartments, presentational and smart components with logic. Used Composition API with composables for logic reuse: `useBreakpoints`, `useBuildingPanel`, `useModal3D`.

blocks.subtitle: Design system and UI
blocks.text: Implemented glassmorphism effects with blur and transparency. Mobile-first approach with adaptive breakpoints. Detailed design system documentation for component consistency.

blocks.subtitle: Stack and tools
blocks.text: Vue 3 with Composition API for reactivity, Vite for fast builds and HMR, Tailwind CSS for styling. Three.js for 3D, Mapbox GL for maps, Threebox for integration. Mock data in `src/mocks/` for development, typed Building and Apartment structures.

Got interactive real estate visualization platform: buildings in 3D on maps, apartment filtering, detailed panels with information, adaptive design. Modular architecture simplifies feature expansion and adding new properties.
